name: How To Rotate Pdf file Online for Free
description: You are only 3 steps away from rotating pdf file

step.text: Choose the PDF you want to rotate ,By clicking on the large box above or drag it to the 'Rotate PDF' tool .
step.name: 1- Choose file

step.text: Set the rotation direction,Normal, 90 degrees ,180 degrees , 270 degrees and 360 degrees are available.
step.name: 2-Set rotation

step.text: Click 'Upload' button to start rotating the PDF online.Download the rotated PDF file after processing.
step.name: 3- Download
